title: Polki Kundan Chandbali Earrings with Pastel Drops
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Exhibits exquisite Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Traditional Chandbali design reimagined with pastel hues. Features a floral Polki Kundan setting with uncut diamonds intricately set in gold. The delicate Rose Quartz and Emerald drops are strung with freshwater pearls, adding a touch of whimsy and elegance. The use of Polki diamonds gives the earrings a vintage charm.
occasions: or any festive occasion. Suitable for modern saree styles
or even fusion outfits. Also a great choice for Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: A stunning blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship and contemporary pastel colors. The Polki diamonds provide a timeless elegance, while the Rose Quartz and Emerald drops add a modern touch. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings are a true statement piece and an heirloom in the making. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail.
